title: Calories in a Chicken Wing
meta_description: Learn calories in a chicken wing, plus protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details per wing with easy tweaks for preparation.
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on, roasted; average size (~85g total weight including bone).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin removal, and added sauces; check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wing provides ~99 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted, skin-on chicken wing.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken wing?
faqs.a: Roughly 8.1 g protein per roasted wing.
No carbs in plain roasted chicken wings; 0 g.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in a chicken wing?
faqs.a: Frying adds ~50 kcal per wing due to absorbed oil.

faqs.q: Are these values for bone-in or boneless?
faqs.a: Bone-in; boneless wings (meat only) may vary by portion size.
